13131.content: After the party was over and all the guests went home, Angelica decided that she actually wanted to be a baby again. Do her parents let her have her wish?
13131.title: After the party

131311.content: They first bought her baby toys?
131311.title: Yes

choices: They bought diapers that can fit Angelica

1313112.title: Did something else.

13131121.content: After buying them, did Angelica put herself into a diaper?

131311212.content: Where did he do it?
131311212.title: Drew did

1313112122.content: As it ws done, did Angelica stay still?
1313112122.title: On a changing table

13131121221.content: Angelica was glad her dad was going to diaper her that she would try to lie still while he did it? What did Drew do first?
13131121221.title: Yup

131311212211.content: Drew grabbed Angelica's ankles and carefully lifted up her bottom. He then slid the new diaper underneath, then he started to wipe. How did Angelica think the wipe felt on her tushy?
131311212211.title: Wipe her bottom

1313112122111.content: She shivered as a result?
1313112122111.title: She thought it was cold

1313112122112.content: Angelica stared to smile when the wipe touched her bottom. She thought it felt nice and soothing and cool but not too cold. What next?
1313112122112.title: She thought it was nice

13131121221121.content: Did she cough a bit?
13131121221121.title: Baby powder

choices: Make Angelica giggle by tickling her tushy
131311212211212.content: What else did the powder do?
131311212211212.title: Something else.

1313112122112122.content: Drew then got her into a new diaper. That done, she went to play with the others.
1313112122112122.title: The smell makes her relax

13131121221121221.content: What did they do first?
13131121221121221.title: Yup

131311212211212211.content: They played with some of his blocks?
131311212211212211.title: Play with their toys

1313112122112122111.content: Were they trying to build something with them?
1313112122112122111.title: Yeah

13131121221121221111.content: Were they seeing if they could build a tower?
13131121221121221111.title: Yes

131311212211212211111.content: Were they able to do it without it toppling over?
131311212211212211111.title: Yeah

1313112122112122111112.content: It eventually fell due to the weight on one end being too much, but, they were able to get out of the way before it fell?
1313112122112122111112.title: No

13131121221121221111121.content:
Everyone got to a safe distance.

What happened next?
13131121221121221111121.title: Yeah

info.brief_description: What if The Rugrats went on a different path on any episode of the 9 seasons?
info.description:
There are a some rules that You must obey.


1. keep it clean.
2. Diaper changes are allowed.
3. Nothing rude.
4. Every chapter must be appropriate.
5. Their must never be a mean chapter or it will be deleted.
6. This is the only way the story can stay alive.
7. No Weight gain.
8. If you want to Have the characters get age regressed, You must have excellent grammar with details.
9. No age Progression.
10. Potty training is allowed as well as well as if in alternate episodes that must appropriate.
11. The Rugrats can remove their clothes only if they take a bath or go nakie like in Naked Tommy. But, that must never be inappropriate.
11. This series have had nine seasons. So Keep in that 9 seasoned universe
12. Strange things can happen as well.
13. No age Progression (Which means no all grown up)
14. No Violence or any thing that is wrong.
15. Anywhere around the world is perfect for The Rugrats to go to on adventures.
16. They can meet the thornberrys family again.
17. Have fun!
